summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 5.5°C) and outside temperature (down 5.0°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 729 m), and light levels (up 8048 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (up 0.2 mm), cloud levels (up 1676 m), and light levels (up 9909 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 728.8m lower than yesterday, 651.0m lower than the past week, 1675.8m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 995.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and bright intervals likely. Changeable conditions.
